archimate:BusinessService.name: Channel Activity Analysis
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
Example of use: A customer attempts to self-serve a product sale but gives up. Later they call the contact center and their recent attempt is used to route the contact to a sales rep, prepped to continue the applications
General comment: Channel activity analysis provides a range of analytical insights into channel use to support access controls, relationship sales and development approaches and to help detect possible fraudulent activity
Business Purpose : Track and analyze channel activity to support relationship development, to detect unwanted behavior and constrain channel use as necessary
Пример использования: Клиент пытается самостоятельно обслуживать продажу продукта, но сдается. Позже они звонят в контакт-центр, и их недавняя попытка используется для маршрутизации контакта торговому представителю, подготовленному для продолжения приложений
Общее замечание: Анализ деятельности канала предоставляет аналитические выводы в пользование канала поддержка контроля доступа, продажа связь и подходы к разработке и помочь выявить возможные мошеннические действия
деловая цель : Отслеживание и анализ активности канала для поддержки развития отношений, выявления нежелательного поведения и ограничения использования канала по мере необходимости
Service Domain - Channel Activity Analysis Channel activity analysis provides a range of analytical insights into channel use to support access controls, relationship sales and development approaches and to help detect possible fraudulent activity
Detailed Summary This service domain tracks and analyzes channel activity to support relationship development, to detect unwanted behavior, possible fraud, and to constrain channel use as necessary (for example tracking usage frequency and cumulative transaction amounts within a period)
Executive Summary This service domain tracks and analyzes channel activity to support relationship development, to detect unwanted behavior, possible fraud, and to constrain channel use as necessary (for example tracking usage frequency and cumulative transaction amounts within a period)
Examples Of Use A customer attempts to self-serve a product sale but gives up. Later they call the contact center and their recent attempt is used to route the contact to a sales rep who is prompted to continue the product application
